title: French Parents Cautiously Send Children Back To Jewish Schools
teaser: Moshe Goldwaser's 9-year-old daughter goes to a Jewish day school in the Paris metro area. He talks to Audie Cornish about how he and his wife discussed what happened at the kosher market with their daughter and why they all feel reassured by the security provided by the French government.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
